mapper.sql: IFNULL(B.BUYER_ID,'') AS buyerId, IFNULL(B.BUYER_CODE,'') AS buyerCode, IFNULL(B.BUYER_NAME,'') AS buyerName, IFNULL(B.STORE_NO,'') AS buyerShop, IFNULL(B.LGCS_AREA_CODE,'') AS lgcsAreaCode, IFNULL(D.LGCS_AREA_NAME,'') AS lgcsAreaName, IFNULL(B.PROVINCE_CODE,'') AS provinceCode, IFNULL(E.PROVINCE_NAME,'') AS provinceName, IFNULL(B.CITY_CODE,'') AS cityCode, IFNULL(F.CITY_NAME,'') AS cityName, IFNULL(B.DISTRICT_CODE,'') AS districtCode, IFNULL(G.DISTRICT_NAME,'') AS districtName, IFNULL(B.BUYER_ADDR,'') AS buyerAddr, IFNULL(CONCAT(IFNULL(E.PROVINCE_NAME,''),' ',IFNULL(F.CITY_NAME,''),' ',IFNULL(G.DISTRICT_NAME,''),' '),'') AS domainName, ifnull(J.ACCOUNT_NAME, '') AS accountName, ifnull(J.TEL_NO, '') AS busiTel, ifnull(J.TEL_NO, '') AS telNo, IFNULL(L.EMPLOYEE_NAME,'') AS employeeName, IFNULL(B.SUPERIOR_TYPE,'') AS superiorType, IFNULL(B.SUPERIOR_NAME,'') AS superiorName, IFNULL(B.SUPERIOR_TYPE,'') AS buyerType, IFNULL(B.SUPERIOR_NAME,'') AS buyerTypeName, ifnull(K.CONSTANT_NAME, '') AS marketingsStatusName, IFNULL(K.CONSTANT_VALUE,'') AS marketingsStatusCode, IFNULL(TERMINAL.MARKET_NAME,FOOD.MARKET_NAME) AS marketName, IFNULL(B.SUPERIOR_ID,'') AS marketId

FROM by_buyer_basic_info AS B LEFT JOIN MD_LOGISTICS_AREA AS D ON B.LGCS_AREA_CODE=D.LGCS_AREA_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_PROVINCE E ON B.PROVINCE_CODE=E.PROVINCE_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CITY F ON F.CITY_CODE=B.CITY_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_DISTRICT G ON G.DISTRICT_CODE=B.DISTRICT_CODE AND F.CITY_ID=G.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN by_buyer_account J ON J.BUYER_ID = B.BUYER_ID LEFT JOIN comm_constant K ON K.CONSTANT_VALUE = B.MARKETINGS_STATUS AND K.CONSTANT_TYPE = 'MarketingSatus' LEFT JOIN by_buyer_employee L ON L.EMPLOYEE_TYPE='1' AND L.BUYER_ID=B.BUYER_ID LEFT JOIN by_market_food AS FOOD ON FOOD.FOD_MARKET_ID=B.SUPERIOR_ID AND B.SUPERIOR_TYPE='2' LEFT JOIN by_market_terminal AS TERMINAL ON TERMINAL.TER_MARKET_ID=B.SUPERIOR_ID AND B.SUPERIOR_TYPE='1'
INNER JOIN by_buyer_salestarget H ON H.BUYER_ID=B.BUYER_ID
INNER JOIN by_buyer_pd_cla I ON I.BUYER_ID=B.BUYER_ID
